All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArmorUp
    Increments armor upon activation by a vehicle.
    BoardTile
    Smallest unit of gameboard.
    Bullet
    Moving explosive with set range of N tiles and unchangeable direction.
    BulletDriver
    Handles movement of all bullets on gameboard.
    Constants  
    DynamicResizingListener
    Dynamically resizes text with the resizing of a specified JPanel.
    EnemyTank
    Is identical to vehicle.
    EnemyTankDriver
    Simple AI that submits random moves to GameController.
    ExplosionTile
    Explosion which is able to hit entities.
    Explosive
    Parent class of Bullet, Mine and Explosive tile.
    FirePowerUp
    Class increments damage upon activation by a vehicle.
    GameBoard
    Acts as middle man between BoardTile instances and GameController.
    GameController
    Handles all requests to modify model: Handles creation and movement of bullets.
    GameLoop
    Handles updating view at set framerate and forwards user input to controller.
    GameView
    Displays game GUI and handles calls for updates of GUI.
    HealthUp
    Increments health upon activation by a vehicle.
    Main  
    MenuController
    Handles user actions in main menu.
    MenuView
    Renders Main Menu.
    Mine
    Explodes upon being driven on by a Vehicle.
    PlayerKeyListener
    Class that handles keyboard input from user.
    PlayerTank
    Is identical to vehicle.
    Rock
    Class is used to create indestructible barriers in levels.
    Vehicle
    Parent class of EnemyTank and PlayerTank.
